name: heptane to generic market for solvent, organic | solvent, organic | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4147/documentation

This is a linking activity which links the product heptane to the generic market for organic solvents. All chemicals that enter this market provide the function of an organic solvent.

The activity starts with the reception of heptane

The activity ends with the production of solvent, organic for the generic market
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products

processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: the present inventory is a linking activity, from fraction 1 of naphtha separation process, to the generic product "chemical, organic"
